snippet: Alan Pardew has been sacked as Crystal Palace manager, the Premier League club said on Thursday, with former England boss Sam Allardyce appearing poised to take over....
lead_paragraph: Alan Pardew has been sacked as Crystal Palace manager, the Premier League club said on Thursday, with former England boss Sam Allardyce appearing poised to take over.

headline.main: Allardyce Tipped to Succeed Sacked Pardew at Palace
headline.print_headline: Allardyce Tipped to Succeed Sacked Pardew at Palace
